instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2936 Human error Mine...
threads.message:
Hi Duke!!

I ve disconnected FPC of fan , with metal tweezers , without taking battery off!!

I ve smell some burn shit!! PpBus is very low on diode mode Measure, And pp5s5 too!!
Can you guide me , no fan spin ! :(

thabks Pal

threads.title: 820-2936 Human error Mine...
threads.message: There is no voltage on the fan if the machine was off so something else got fried. Resistance to GND on PPBUS?

threads.title: 820-2936 Human error Mine...
threads.message:
Hi Duke!! 1 kohm resistance to ground, and diode mode measure 0,450, voltage : 12,58

Thanks Pal

threads.title: 820-2936 Human error Mine...
threads.message: That is ok so far. Is PP3v3_S5 present on L7220?
